name: Sorcery Blade
overview: Sorcery Blade is a SF fantasy RPG set on Mars in the year 3000 AD. In the world where the civilization of the earth collapsed due to the fall of the gigantic meteorite, descendants (Carnelian) who emigrated to Mars got over the pioneering era, which was a departure from the primitive age, and soon the civilization level aims the earth It will lead to trying to build a spaceship. While participating in the plan to build a spaceship to the Earth, the protagonist Tia loses her fiancée by the terrorist organization and will throw himself into the battle to deprive him of his opponents. Weapons used in battle are equipped with unique skills, and it will be advantageous to fight with changing weapons according to the game situation. Furthermore, shaking the Wii remote control in the direction specified when activating the weapon skill can obtain a more powerful effect. Also, if you shake the 2P's Wii Remote according to the timing when the hero wields weapons, support characters can make additional attacks, etc., while being RPG, you can enjoy it with two people. The weapon creation using the Wii remote control changes the completion ability depending on the player. Other than that, you can enjoy the unique fun of Wii, such as "Mii town" where Mii appears as an inhabitant.
